quotes.quote: An armed man is a citizen. A disarmed man is a subject.
It ain't gun control we need; it's sin control.
If someone has a gun and is trying to kill you, it would be reasonable to shoot back with your own gun.
Anyone can shoot a gun but the real power comes from non-violent means.
With the right to bear arms comes a great responsibility to use caution and common sense on handgun purchases.
You don't need a weapon to protect yourself.
You don't spread democracy with a barrel of a gun.
Gun control is like trying to reduce drunk driving by making it tougher for sober people to own cars.
A free people ought...to be armed
The people have a right to keep and bear arms.
One man with a gun can control a hundred without one.
There are no dangerous weapons. There are only dangerous men.
I don't think there should be more gun control. I think there should be more education.
You don't shoot to kill; you shoot to stay alive.
To conquer a nation, first disarm its citizens.
I have a very strict gun control policy: if there's a gun around, I want to be in control of it.
Gun control means control. It means control for the government and the government starts controlling the people.
Gun bans disarm victims, putting them at the mercy of murderers or terrorists who think nothing of breaking the gun laws.
An unarmed man can only flee from evil, and evil is not overcome by fleeing from it.
How many have to die before we will give up these dangerous toys?
The only thing that stops a bad guy with a gun is a good guy with a gun.
The right to buy weapons is the right to be free.
Laws can't control the lawless.
Gun Control is not about guns; it's about control.
Guns are not the problem. The species is the problem.
Guns are not the problem. It is us that is the problem.
The world is filled with violence. Because criminals carry guns, we decent law-abiding citizens should also have guns. Otherwise they will win and the decent people will lose.
We do not need guns and bombs to bring peace, we need love and compassion.
If more sane people were armed, the crazy people would get off fewer shots.
Irony: Some of the people yelling the loudest for gun control are protected by armed security.
It's not a gun control problem; it's a cultural control problem.
Gun bans don't disarm criminals, gun bans attract them.
We don't have a gun problem; we have a math problem: ZERO GUNS = ZERO GUN-RELATED DEATHS.
Gun Control: A measure to ensure that guns always point in one direction.
Not everybody needs a gun , to get things done.
For an unarmed man may be attacked with greater confidence than an armed man.
Know guns, know peace, know safety. No guns, no peace, no safety.
